{"data" => {
          "id"=>"#{article.id}",
          "type"=>"articles",
          "attributes"=>{
          "title"=>"#{article.title}",
          "content"=>"#{article.content}"},
          "relationships"=>{
          "comments"=>{
          "data"=>[{
          "id"=>"#{comment.id}", "type"=>"comments"}
          ]}}}
}
